result.orig: sméid sí orthu ach rinne siad neamhaird di

result.ponchtml: sméid sí orṫu aċ rinne siad neaṁaird diShe nodded at them but they ignored her.

result.eng: She stretched her limbs and took a deep breath.
result.ga: bhain sí searradh as a géaga agus tharraing anáil dhomhain
result.orig: bhain sí searradh as a géaga agus tharraing anáil dhomhain
result.html: bhain sí searradh as a géaga agus tharraing anáil dhomhainShe stretched her limbs and took a deep breath.
result.ponchtml: ḃain sí searraḋ as a géaga agus ṫarraing anáil ḋoṁainShe stretched her limbs and took a deep breath.

result.eng: If that's what fate had in store for her, she'd do it.
result.ga: má bhí sé sin sa chinniúint di dhéanfadh sí é
result.orig: má bhí sé sin sa chinniúint di dhéanfadh sí é
result.html: má bhí sé sin sa chinniúint di dhéanfadh sí éIf that's what fate had in store for her, she'd do it.
result.ponchtml: má ḃí sé sin sa ċinniúint di ḋéanfaḋ sí éIf that's what fate had in store for her, she'd do it.

result.eng: Her hair was stuck to her forehead from the rain.
result.ga: bhí a cuid gruaige greamaithe dá baithis ag an mbáisteach
result.orig: bhí a cuid gruaige greamaithe dá baithis ag an mbáisteach
result.html: bhí a cuid gruaige greamaithe dá baithis ag an mbáisteachHer hair was stuck to her forehead from the rain.
result.ponchtml: ḃí a cuid gruaige greamaiṫe dá baiṫis ag an mbáisteaċHer hair was stuck to her forehead from the rain.

result.eng: She lifted her blouse to slip the nipple of her breast in her daughter's mouth.
result.ga: d'ardaigh sí a geansaí chun didín a cíche a shá isteach i mbéal a hiníne
result.orig: d'ardaigh sí a geansaí chun didín a cíche a shá isteach i mbéal a hiníne
result.html: d'ardaigh sí a geansaí chun didín a cíche a shá isteach i mbéal a hiníneShe lifted her blouse to slip the nipple of her breast in her daughter's mouth.
result.ponchtml: d'ardaiġ sí a geansaí ċun didín a cíċe a ẛá isteaċ i mbéal a hiníneShe lifted her blouse to slip the nipple of her breast in her daughter's mouth.

result.eng: She abandoned her native country for a job as a child minder with a family in Ireland.
result.ga: thréig sí a tír dhúchais ar son poist mar fheighlí linbh le teaghlach in Éirinn
result.orig: thréig sí a tír dhúchais ar son poist mar fheighlí linbh le teaghlach in Éirinn
result.html: thréig sí a tír dhúchais ar son poist mar fheighlí linbh le teaghlach in ÉirinnShe abandoned her native country for a job as a child minder with a family in Ireland.
result.ponchtml: ṫréig sí a tír ḋúċais ar son poist mar ḟeiġlí linḃ le teaġlaċ in ÉirinnShe abandoned her native country for a job as a child minder with a family in Ireland.

result.eng: She would send money to her family at home.
result.ga: chuireadh sí airgead chuig a muintir sa bhaile
result.orig: chuireadh sí airgead chuig a muintir sa bhaile
result.html: chuireadh sí airgead chuig a muintir sa bhaileShe would send money to her family at home.
result.ponchtml: ċuireaḋ sí airgead ċuig a muintir sa ḃaileShe would send money to her family at home.

result.eng: They gave her some pocket money.
result.ga: thug siad airgead póca di
result.orig: thug siad airgead póca di
result.html: thug siad airgead póca diThey gave her some pocket money.
result.ponchtml: ṫug siad airgead póca diThey gave her some pocket money.

result.eng: She was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.
result.ga: ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonar
result.orig: ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonar
result.html: ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonarShe was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ cead aici dul amaċ as an teaċ ina haonarShe was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.

result.eng: She lost her passport as well as other official documents.
result.ga: chaill sí a pas chomh maith le doiciméid oifigiúla eile
result.orig: chaill sí a pas chomh maith le doiciméid oifigiúla eile
result.html: chaill sí a pas chomh maith le doiciméid oifigiúla eileShe lost her passport as well as other official documents.
result.ponchtml: ċaill sí a pas ċoṁ maiṫ le doiciméid oifigiúla eileShe lost her passport as well as other official documents.

result.eng: She was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.
result.ga: buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradh
result.orig: buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradh
result.html: buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradhShe was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.
result.ponchtml: buaileaḋ í roinnt uaireanta agus ċuaṫas i muinín an ḟornirt ċun a cuid gruaige a ḃearraḋShe was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.

result.eng: They made up a new name for her.
result.ga: cheap siad ainm nua di
result.orig: cheap siad ainm nua di
result.html: cheap siad ainm nua diThey made up a new name for her.
result.ponchtml: ċeap siad ainm nua diThey made up a new name for her.

result.eng: I translated the information into Irish for her.
result.ga: d'aistríos an t-eolas go gaeilge di
result.orig: d'aistríos an t-eolas go gaeilge di
result.html: d'aistríos an t-eolas go gaeilge diI translated the information into Irish for her.
result.ponchtml: d'aistríos an t-eolas go gaeilge diI translated the information into Irish for her.

result.eng: She called to her friend. {shouted}
result.ga: ghlaoigh sí ar a cara
result.orig: ghlaoigh sí ar a cara
result.html: ghlaoigh sí ar a caraShe called to her friend. {shouted}
result.ponchtml: ġlaoiġ sí ar a caraShe called to her friend. {shouted}

result.eng: At the top of her voice, she called:...
result.ga: i mbarr a gutha ghlaoigh sí
result.orig: i mbarr a gutha ghlaoigh sí
result.html: i mbarr a gutha ghlaoigh síAt the top of her voice, she called:...
result.ponchtml: i mbarr a guṫa ġlaoiġ síAt the top of her voice, she called:...

result.eng: I've known her long time.
result.ga: tá seanaithne agamsa uirthi
result.orig: tá seanaithne agamsa uirthi
result.html: tá seanaithne agamsa uirthiI've known her long time.
result.ponchtml: tá seanaiṫne agamsa uirṫiI've known her long time.

result.eng: Come here and take a look at her.
result.ga: gabh anseo go bhfeice tú í
result.orig: gabh anseo go bhfeice tú í
result.html: gabh anseo go bhfeice tú íCome here and take a look at her.
result.ponchtml: gaḃ anseo go ḃfeice tú íCome here and take a look at her.

result.eng: She was eating a potato tart from her hand.
result.ga: bhí sí ag ithe toirtín preátaí as cúl a doirn
result.orig: bhí sí ag ithe toirtín preátaí as cúl a doirn
result.html: bhí sí ag ithe toirtín preátaí as cúl a doirnShe was eating a potato tart from her hand.
result.ponchtml: ḃí sí ag iṫe toirtín preátaí as cúl a doirnShe was eating a potato tart from her hand.

result.eng: He grabbed her by her hair.
result.ga: fuair sé greim gruaige uirthi
result.orig: fuair sé greim gruaige uirthi
result.html: fuair sé greim gruaige uirthiHe grabbed her by her hair.
result.ponchtml: fuair sé greim gruaige uirṫiHe grabbed her by her hair.

result.eng: Her eyes were red from how much she had been crying.
result.ga: bhí a dhá shúil dearg ar mhéad is a bhí caointe aici
result.orig: bhí a dhá shúil dearg ar mhéad is a bhí caointe aici
result.html: bhí a dhá shúil dearg ar mhéad is a bhí caointe aiciHer eyes were red from how much she had been crying.
result.ponchtml: ḃí a ḋá ẛúil dearg ar ṁéad is a ḃí caointe aiciHer eyes were red from how much she had been crying.

result.eng: Her family stopped being mad at her in the meantime.
result.ga: bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá am
result.orig: bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá am
result.html: bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá amHer family stopped being mad at her in the meantime.
result.ponchtml: ḃí an ḟearg ar ẛiúl dá muintir eadar an dá amHer family stopped being mad at her in the meantime.

result.eng: He would put up with anything for her.
result.ga: d'fhulaingeodh sé rud ar bith ar a sonsa
result.orig: d'fhulaingeodh sé rud ar bith ar a sonsa
result.html: d'fhulaingeodh sé rud ar bith ar a sonsaHe would put up with anything for her.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟulaingeoḋ sé rud ar biṫ ar a sonsaHe would put up with anything for her.

result.eng: What happened to her?
result.ga: goidé tháinig uirthi
result.orig: goidé tháinig uirthi
result.html: goidé tháinig uirthiWhat happened to her?
result.ponchtml: goidé ṫáinig uirṫiWhat happened to her?

result.eng: He would never do anything to hurt her.
result.ga: ní dhéanfadh sé a dhath choíche a ghoinfeadh a croí
result.orig: ní dhéanfadh sé a dhath choíche a ghoinfeadh a croí
result.html: ní dhéanfadh sé a dhath choíche a ghoinfeadh a croíHe would never do anything to hurt her.
result.ponchtml: ní ḋéanfaḋ sé a ḋaṫ ċoíċe a ġoinfeaḋ a croíHe would never do anything to hurt her.
